topic: Anyone know if I can proactively prevent this?
subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Anyone know if I can proactively prevent this?
email_text_original:
You don't often get email from philipelder@mpecsinc.ca. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
Would it be possible to use Software Restriction Policies to block CoPilot
altogether? 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
